article_metadata.title: Democrats to renew push for Medicaid expansion in SC | The State

og.description: Democrats plan to renew efforts next year to expand Medicaid eligibility in South Carolina, saying that’s the most important way to continue the work of their slain colleague, Sen. Clementa Pinckney.
